did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: University Relations tape recordings and movie films, 1954-1985.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. University Relations. Radio - Television - Film Office.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Audio tapes of radio programs and campus events; radio production logs, 1972-1981; and movie films. Also, video tapes of campus events.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Audio tapes of radio programs and campus events; radio production logs, 1972-1981; and movie films. Also, video tapes of campus events.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Restricted in part to permission of office of origin.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: University Relations, Radio-Television-Film Office tape recordings, #4-3-875. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: A list of the tapes can be found here: http://rmc.library.cornell.edu/EAD/pdf_guides/Tape_Recording_Inventory.pdf
Additional tapes may be shelved loose
